title: Ôn tập kiểm tra cuối kỳ 1 - Tiếng Anh 6 Global Success
description: Ôn tập đề thi cuối học kỳ 1 Tiếng Anh 6 - Global Success với giải thích chi tiết
grammarTopics: Prepositions of place (Giới từ chỉ nơi chốn)

theory.brief: Đề thi HK1 Tiếng Anh 6 bao gồm các dạng bài: Nghe hiểu (TRUE/FALSE, điền từ), Đọc hiểu, Ngữ pháp, Viết lại câu, và Viết câu từ gợi ý.
examples: There is a fridge in my kitchen. (There is/are)
The cat is in front of the computer. (Giới từ)
Oranges are cheaper than apples. (So sánh hơn)

exercises.title: Listening - Phu Quoc Island TRUE/FALSE
exercises.instruction: Nghe đoạn audio và xác định các câu sau đúng (TRUE) hay sai (FALSE)
exercises.tapescript: Phu Quoc is a very beautiful island in Viet Nam. It is in Kien Giang. It has beautiful beaches and green forests. It also has resorts, hotels, and bars. The people here are friendly. Phu Quoc has an international airport, and travelling there is easy. Tourists can visit fishing villages, national parks, pagodas and temples. They also like to eat the seafood here. It is delicious. Sailing and fishing are popular water sports. You can buy interesting things at the markets on the island.
exercises.audioSource: SGK Tiếng Anh 6 Global Success - Unit 5 Skills 2

questions.statement: Phu Quoc is a very beautiful island in Viet Nam.
questions.explanation: Đúng. Phú Quốc là một hòn đảo rất đẹp ở Việt Nam.

questions.statement: There are no green forests in Phu Quoc.
questions.explanation: Sai. Phú Quốc có nhiều rừng xanh.

questions.statement: Tourists can visit fishing villages and national parks there.
questions.explanation: Đúng. Du khách có thể thăm làng chài và vườn quốc gia.

questions.statement: You can not play water sports in Phu Quoc.
questions.explanation: Sai. Bạn có thể chơi các môn thể thao dưới nước ở Phú Quốc.

hints: Chú ý từ 'no' và 'not' trong câu hỏi

exercises.title: Listening - Vy's Neighbourhood
exercises.instruction: Nghe và chọn đáp án đúng để điền vào chỗ trống
exercises.tapescript:
Khang: Where do you live, Vy?
Vy: I live in the suburbs of Ho Chi Minh City.
Khang: What do you like about your neighbourhood?
Vy: There are many things I like about it. There's a big market near my house. There are also many shops, restaurants and art galleries here. The streets are wide. The people here are helpful and friendly.
Khang: Is there anything you don't like about it?
Vy: The schools are too far away. There are also some factories near here, so the air isn't very clean and the streets are noisy and crowded.
exercises.audioSource: SGK Tiếng Anh 6 Global Success - Unit 4 Skills 2

questions.question: Vy lives in the _______ of Ho Chi Minh city.
questions.explanation: Vy sống ở ngoại ô (suburbs) của thành phố Hồ Chí Minh.

questions.question: There is a big _______ near her house.
questions.explanation: Có một chợ (market) lớn gần nhà cô ấy.

questions.question: The people here are helpful and _______.
questions.explanation: Người dân ở đây tốt bụng và thân thiện (friendly).

questions.question: The streets are noisy and _______.
questions.explanation: Các con đường ồn ào và ĐÔNG ĐÚC (crowded) - theo SGK Unit 4 Skills 2.

hints: Chú ý các tính từ mô tả người và nơi chốn

exercises.title: Reading - Ha Long Bay
passage: Ha Long Bay is in Quang Ninh. It has many (1)_______ and caves. Tuan Chau, with its beautiful (2)_______, is a popular tourist attraction in Ha Long Bay.
There you can enjoy great (3)_______ natural. And you can join in exciting activities. Ha Long Bay is Viet Nam's best natural (4)_______.

questions.question: Blank (1): Ha Long Bay has many _______ and caves
questions.explanation: Vịnh Hạ Long có nhiều ĐẢO (islands) và hang động.

questions.question: Blank (2): Tuan Chau, with its beautiful _______
questions.explanation: Tuần Châu với những bãi biển (beaches) đẹp.

questions.question: Blank (3): You can enjoy great _______ natural
questions.explanation: Bạn có thể thưởng thức hải sản (seafood) tươi ngon.

questions.question: Blank (4): Viet Nam's best natural _______
questions.explanation: Vịnh Hạ Long là kỳ quan (wonder) thiên nhiên đẹp nhất của Việt Nam.

hints: Chú ý ngữ cảnh về du lịch biển

exercises.title: Reading - Khang's Neighbourhood
passage: Khang lives in the suburbs of Da Nang city. It is great for outdoor activities because it has beautiful parks, sandy beaches, and fine weather.

It has many shops, restaurants, and markets. The people here are friendly. The food is good. There are two things he dislikes about it: There are many modern buildings and the streets are busy and crowded.

questions.question: Why is Khang's neighbourhood great for outdoor activities?
questions.explanation: Cả A (có công viên đẹp) và B (có bãi biển cát) đều đúng.

hints: Đọc kỹ câu đầu tiên của đoạn văn

exercises.question: How many buildings are there in the writer's new school?
exercises.explanation: Trường có 3 (three) tòa nhà. 'It has three buildings.'
hints: Đọc kỹ thông tin về trường học

exercises.question: What are the teachers like?
exercises.explanation: Các giáo viên thân thiện (friendly). 'They are friendly.'
hints: Tìm tính từ mô tả giáo viên

exercises.question: Are there any art clubs in the writer's school?
exercises.explanation: Có, có câu lạc bộ nghệ thuật. Trường có các CLB: Dance, English, Arts, Football, and basketball.
hints: Đọc phần câu lạc bộ của trường

exercises.question: Why does the writer love his school?
options: Because it is a good school
Because it is a beautiful school
Because it is a quiet school
Because it is a far school
exercises.explanation: Vì đó là một trường tốt (good school). 'I love my school because it is a good school.'
hints: Tìm câu có chứa 'because'

exercises.original: There is a fridge in my house.
exercises.instruction: Viết lại câu bắt đầu với: I have
exercises.answer: I have a fridge in my house.
acceptedAnswers: I have a fridge in my house.
I have a fridge in my house
exercises.explanation: There is a + N → I have a + N
hints: Chuyển từ 'There is' sang 'I have'

exercises.original: The cat is in front of the computer.
exercises.instruction: Viết lại câu bắt đầu với: The computer is
exercises.answer: The computer is behind the cat.
acceptedAnswers: The computer is behind the cat.
The computer is behind the cat
exercises.explanation: in front of ↔ behind (đối lập)
hints: Giới từ đối lập: in front of ↔ behind

exercises.original: Apples are more expensive than oranges.
exercises.instruction: Viết lại câu bắt đầu với: Oranges are
exercises.answer: Oranges are cheaper than apples.
acceptedAnswers: Oranges are cheaper than apples.
Oranges are cheaper than apples
Oranges are less expensive than apples.
Oranges are less expensive than apples
exercises.explanation: more expensive ↔ cheaper (đối lập)
hints: So sánh hơn đối lập: expensive ↔ cheap

exercises.original: I want to become a football player.
exercises.instruction: Viết lại câu bắt đầu với: I would
exercises.answer: I would like to become a football player.
acceptedAnswers: I would like to become a football player.
I would like to become a football player
exercises.explanation: want to → would like to
hints: want to = would like to

exercises.question: Let's (go) _______ to Cho Gao park.
exercises.answer: go
acceptedAnswers: go
exercises.explanation: Let's + V (nguyên mẫu)
hints: Let's + V-inf

exercises.question: We should (help) _______ with the housework.
exercises.answer: help
acceptedAnswers: help
exercises.explanation: should + V (nguyên mẫu)
hints: should + V-inf

exercises.question: Minh often (play) _______ sports on the Sunday.
exercises.answer: plays
acceptedAnswers: plays
exercises.explanation: Hiện tại đơn với chủ ngữ số ít: He/She + V-s/es
hints: Chủ ngữ số ít + V-s/es

exercises.question: Hoa and Ba (read) _______ books in the library now.
exercises.answer: are reading
acceptedAnswers: are reading
exercises.explanation: Hiện tại tiếp diễn với 'now': S + am/is/are + V-ing
hints: Dấu hiệu 'now' → hiện tại tiếp diễn

exercises.prompt: Lan / live / the country / house / in / Tien Giang
exercises.answer: Lan lives in the country house in Tien Giang.
acceptedAnswers: Lan lives in the country house in Tien Giang.
Lan lives in the country house in Tien Giang
Lan lives in a country house in Tien Giang.
Lan lives in a country house in Tien Giang
exercises.explanation: Sắp xếp: S + V + địa điểm
hints: Chú ý chia động từ 'live' với chủ ngữ số ít

exercises.prompt: There / be / a river / a / temple / there
exercises.answer: There is a river and a temple there.
acceptedAnswers: There is a river and a temple there.
There is a river and a temple there
There are a river and a temple there.
There are a river and a temple there
exercises.explanation: There is/are + N + địa điểm
hints: Dùng 'and' để nối hai danh từ

exercises.answer: The food is delicious and cheap.
acceptedAnswers: The food is delicious and cheap.
The food is delicious and cheap
exercises.explanation: S + be + adj1 and adj2
hints: Dùng 'and' để nối hai tính từ

exercises.prompt: She / like / her / neighbourhood / very much
exercises.answer: She likes her neighbourhood very much.
acceptedAnswers: She likes her neighbourhood very much.
She likes her neighbourhood very much
exercises.explanation: S + V-s/es + O + very much
hints: Chủ ngữ số ít + V-s/es

exercises.title: Listening - Tet Holiday TRUE/FALSE
exercises.instruction: Nghe đoạn audio và xác định các câu sau đúng (TRUE) hay sai (FALSE)

questions.statement: Tet is a time for their family gathering.
questions.explanation: Đúng. Tết là thời gian sum họp gia đình.

questions.statement: Children get lucky money at Tet.
questions.explanation: Đúng. Trẻ em được nhận tiền lì xì vào dịp Tết.

questions.statement: This year Tet is in January.
questions.explanation: Sai. Tết năm nay vào tháng 2 (February).

questions.statement: They clean their homes and decorate them with coloured paper.
questions.explanation: Đúng. Họ dọn dẹp nhà cửa và trang trí bằng giấy màu.

hints: Chú ý thời gian diễn ra Tết

exercises.title: Listening - Preparing for Tet
exercises.instruction: Nghe và chọn đáp án đúng để điền vào chỗ trống
exercises.tapescript: Dear Tom, Tet is coming and I'm very happy. We do a lot of things before Tet. We throw some old things away. We clean and decorate our homes. My mother goes shopping and buys food, red envelopes, and peach flowers. She also buys new clothes for us. My father makes banh chung and cooks them on an open fire. He says that I should make some wishes at Tet, and I shouldn't break anything. It brings bad luck. Yours, Nguyen.
exercises.audioSource: SGK Tiếng Anh 6 Global Success - Unit 6 Skills 2

questions.question: We clean and (1)_______ our homes.
questions.explanation: Chúng ta dọn dẹp và trang trí (decorate) nhà cửa.

questions.question: My mother goes shopping and buys food, red envelopes, and (2)_______.
questions.explanation: Mẹ tôi đi mua sắm và mua hoa đào (peach flowers).

questions.question: He says that I shouldn't (3)_______ anything. It brings bad luck.
questions.explanation: Bố nói rằng không nên làm vỡ (break) bất cứ thứ gì vì sẽ xui.

hints: Chú ý các hoạt động chuẩn bị Tết

exercises.title: Reading - Tet Holiday
passage: Tet is the most important festival for every Vietnamese to (1)_______ a good time while thinking about the new year and the old.
At Tet, people (2)_______ the houses. Almost all shops are closed with people shopping for Tet. Tet is a time for family (3)_______.
Tet is also a time for peace and love. Parents give children lucky money in red (4)_______.

questions.question: Blank (1): Tet is time to _______ a good time
questions.explanation: have a good time = có thời gian vui vẻ

questions.question: Blank (2): At Tet, people _______ the houses
questions.explanation: Dọn dẹp (clean) nhà cửa vào dịp Tết.

questions.question: Blank (3): Tet is a time for family _______
questions.explanation: family gatherings = sum họp gia đình

questions.question: Blank (4): lucky money in red _______
questions.explanation: red envelopes = phong bì đỏ (đựng tiền lì xì)

hints: Chú ý các hoạt động ngày Tết

exercises.original: There are two TVs in my living room.
exercises.instruction: Viết lại câu bắt đầu với: I have
exercises.answer: I have two TVs in my living room.
acceptedAnswers: I have two TVs in my living room.
I have two TVs in my living room
exercises.explanation: There are + N → I have + N

exercises.original: The computer is behind the cat.
exercises.instruction: Viết lại câu bắt đầu với: The cat is
exercises.answer: The cat is in front of the computer.
acceptedAnswers: The cat is in front of the computer.
The cat is in front of the computer
exercises.explanation: behind ↔ in front of (đối lập)
hints: Giới từ đối lập: behind ↔ in front of

exercises.instruction: Viết lại câu bắt đầu với: Minh is
exercises.answer: Minh is taller than Nam.
acceptedAnswers: Minh is taller than Nam.
Minh is taller than Nam
exercises.explanation: shorter ↔ taller (đối lập)
hints: So sánh hơn đối lập: short ↔ tall

exercises.original: It is wrong of us to throw rubbish.
exercises.instruction: Viết lại câu bắt đầu với: We mustn't
exercises.answer: We mustn't throw rubbish.
acceptedAnswers: We mustn't throw rubbish.
We mustn't throw rubbish
We must not throw rubbish.
We must not throw rubbish
exercises.explanation: It is wrong to V → S mustn't V
hints: It is wrong → mustn't

exercises.question: You shouldn't (eat) _______ a lot of sweets.
exercises.answer: eat
acceptedAnswers: eat
exercises.explanation: shouldn't + V (nguyên mẫu)
hints: shouldn't + V-inf

exercises.question: There (be not) _______ any bananas.
exercises.answer: aren't
acceptedAnswers: aren't
are not
exercises.explanation: There are not = There aren't (số nhiều)
hints: bananas (số nhiều) → are

exercises.question: Nam (watch) _______ TV every day.
exercises.answer: watches
acceptedAnswers: watches
exercises.explanation: Hiện tại đơn với chủ ngữ số ít: He/She + V-es
hints: every day → hiện tại đơn

exercises.question: He (play) _______ the piano now.
exercises.answer: is playing
acceptedAnswers: is playing
exercises.explanation: Hiện tại tiếp diễn với 'now': S + is + V-ing
hints: Dấu hiệu 'now' → hiện tại tiếp diễn

exercises.answer: Lam's attraction is Da Lat.
acceptedAnswers: Lam's attraction is Da Lat.
Lam's attraction is Da Lat
exercises.explanation: Sắp xếp: S + be + địa điểm
hints: Chú ý cấu trúc sở hữu 's

exercises.answer: She often goes there by plane.
acceptedAnswers: She often goes there by plane.
She often goes there by plane
exercises.explanation: S + often + V-s/es + địa điểm + by + phương tiện
hints: often → hiện tại đơn, by + phương tiện

exercises.answer: It is famous for waterfalls.
acceptedAnswers: It is famous for waterfalls.
It is famous for waterfalls
It is famous for its waterfalls.
It is famous for its waterfalls
exercises.explanation: be famous for = nổi tiếng về
hints: famous for + N

exercises.prompt: There / she / can / visit / love valley
exercises.answer: There she can visit Love Valley.
acceptedAnswers: There she can visit Love Valley.
There she can visit Love Valley
She can visit Love Valley there.
She can visit Love Valley there
exercises.explanation: There + S + can + V + địa điểm
hints: can + V-inf

exercises.title: Listening - Vy's Neighbourhood TRUE/FALSE
exercises.instruction: Nghe đoạn audio và xác định các câu sau đúng (TRUE) hay sai (FALSE)

questions.statement: Vy lives in the centre of Ho Chi Minh city.
questions.explanation: Sai. Vy sống ở ngoại ô (suburbs), không phải trung tâm.
Sai. Trong bài nghe, Vy nói 'The streets are wide' (rộng), không phải narrow (hẹp).

questions.statement: There is a big market near her house.
questions.explanation: Đúng. Có một chợ lớn gần nhà cô ấy.

questions.statement: There are some factories near her neighbourhood.
questions.explanation: Đúng. Có một số nhà máy gần khu vực của cô ấy.

hints: Phân biệt 'centre' và 'suburbs'

exercises.title: Listening - Mi and Nick's Conversation
exercises.instruction: Nghe và chọn đáp án đúng để điền vào chỗ trống
exercises.tapescript:
Mi: Wow! Your room looks so big, Nick.
Nick: It's Elena's room. She's my sister.
Mi: I see. Is there a TV behind you?
Nick: Yes, there is. Where do you live, Mi?
Mi: I live in a town house. And you?
Nick: I live in a country house. Who do you live with?
Mi: My parents and younger brother. We're moving to a flat next month!
exercises.audioSource: SGK Tiếng Anh 6 Global Success - Unit 2 Getting Started

questions.question: Mi: Wow! Your room looks so (1)_______.
questions.explanation: Phòng trông rất lớn (big).

questions.question: Mi: Is there a TV (2)_______ you?
questions.explanation: TV ở phía sau (behind) bạn.

questions.question: Mi: I live in a (3)_______ house.
questions.explanation: Mi sống ở nhà phố (town house) - theo SGK Unit 2.

questions.question: Mi: My parents and younger (4)_______.
questions.explanation: Em trai (brother).

hints: Chú ý các giới từ chỉ vị trí

exercises.title: Reading - Mui Ne
passage: Mui Ne is popular for its amazing landscapes. The (1)_______ has different colours: white, yellow, red... It's like a (2)_______.
There. You can ride a bike down the (3)_______. You can also fly the kites and have a picnic by the (4)_______.

questions.question: Blank (1): The _______ has different colours
questions.explanation: Cát (sand) có nhiều màu sắc khác nhau.

questions.question: Blank (2): It's like a _______
questions.explanation: Giống như sa mạc (desert).

questions.question: Blank (3): You can ride a bike down the _______
questions.explanation: Bạn có thể đạp xe xuống các sườn dốc (slopes).

questions.question: Blank (4): have a picnic by the _______
questions.explanation: Dã ngoại bên bãi biển (beach).

hints: Chú ý đặc điểm địa hình Mũi Né

exercises.question: A place where a large amount of water falls from a high place. It is...
exercises.explanation: Waterfall = thác nước (nơi nước chảy từ trên cao xuống).
hints: water falls = nước rơi xuống

exercises.question: At Tet, people _______ the houses with flowers.
exercises.explanation: decorate = trang trí. Vào dịp Tết, người ta trang trí nhà cửa bằng hoa.
hints: trang trí = decorate

exercises.question: Children get it in the red envelopes. They are...
exercises.explanation: lucky money = tiền lì xì, được cho trong phong bì đỏ.
hints: red envelopes = phong bì đỏ → tiền lì xì

exercises.question: Today is sunny. I need to put on some...
exercises.explanation: sunscreen = kem chống nắng. Trời nắng thì cần thoa kem chống nắng.
hints: sunny = nắng → cần kem chống nắng

exercises.answer: I am writing about Phu Quoc island.
acceptedAnswers: I am writing about Phu Quoc island.
I am writing about Phu Quoc island
exercises.explanation: S + am/is/are + V-ing + về + địa điểm
hints: Hiện tại tiếp diễn: am + V-ing

exercises.answer: It is in Kien Giang province.
acceptedAnswers: It is in Kien Giang province.
It is in Kien Giang province
exercises.explanation: S + be + in + địa điểm
hints: Dùng 'in' trước tên tỉnh

exercises.answer: It is famous for seafood.
acceptedAnswers: It is famous for seafood.
It is famous for seafood
exercises.explanation: be famous for = nổi tiếng về
hints: famous for + N

exercises.answer: I can play water sports in Phu Quoc.
acceptedAnswers: I can play water sports in Phu Quoc.
